startContinuousSequenceAcquisition

void startContinuousSequenceAcquisition(java.lang.String configGroup,
                                        java.lang.String channel,
                                        double exposure,
                                        int imagingPeriod)
                                        throws MicroscopeException,
                                               java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                               MicroscopeLockedException,
                                               java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                               SettingException
Starts a continuous sequence acquisition. Due to implementation reasons, don't use this method if sequence acquisition should be started on multiple cameras in parallel, but use startParallelContinuousSequenceAcquisition.

Parameters:
channel - The name of the channel.
imagingPeriod - The intervals with which the images should be made.
configGroup - The config group representing the channels.
exposure - The exposure time in ms.
Throws:
MicroscopeException
java.rmi.RemoteException
MicroscopeLockedException
java.lang.InterruptedException
SettingException

startParallelContinuousSequenceAcquisition

@Deprecated
void startParallelContinuousSequenceAcquisition(java.lang.String configGroup,
                                                           java.lang.String channel,
                                                           java.lang.String[] cameras,
                                                           double[] exposures,
                                                           int[] imagingPeriods)
                                                throws MicroscopeException,
                                                       java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                       MicroscopeLockedException,
                                                       java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                       SettingException
Deprecated. 

Starts a continuous sequence acquisition with the given cameras in parallel. Due to implementation reasons, don't start a continuous sequence acquisition for each camera, but use this method once for one of the cameras.

Parameters:
channel - The name of the channel.
imagingPeriods - The intervals with which the images should be made.
configGroup - The config group representing the channels.
exposures - The exposure times of the cameras.
cameras - The cameras.
Throws:
MicroscopeException
java.rmi.RemoteException
MicroscopeLockedException
java.lang.InterruptedException
SettingException

                        throws MicroscopeException,
                               java.rmi.RemoteException,
                               MicroscopeLockedException,
                               java.lang.InterruptedException,
                               SettingException
Deprecated. 

Makes images with the given cameras in parallel.

Parameters:
channel - The name of the channel.
configGroup - The config group representing the channels.
exposures - The exposure times of the cameras.
cameras - The cameras.
listener - The listener where the image should be send to.

continousSequenceAcquisitionPopNextImage

boolean continousSequenceAcquisitionPopNextImage(ImageListener listener,
                                                 boolean saveOlderImages)
                                                 throws MicroscopeException,
                                                        java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                        MicroscopeLockedException,
                                                        java.lang.InterruptedException
Pops an image in the previously started continuous acquisition and sends it to the listener. If no image is available, no image will be send to the listener.

Parameters:
listener - The listener where the image should be send to.
saveOlderImages - if true, all images in the image buffer are saved in chronological order. If false, only the last image gets saved.
Returns:
TRUE if an image was available, false otherwise.
Throws:
MicroscopeException
java.rmi.RemoteException
MicroscopeLockedException
java.lang.InterruptedException

void setTransposeX(boolean transpose)
                   throws MicroscopeLockedException,
                          java.rmi.RemoteException
Sets if the x-direction of images made by this camera should be transposed.

Parameters:
transpose - True, if the x-direction should be transposed.
Throws:
MicroscopeLockedException
java.rmi.RemoteException
